betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Those basic pipes not enough for you? Here's some more! Do note that most of these come in fluid variants.

Stone pipes act like cobblestone pipes but don't connect to cobblestone pipes, think oil and water, they don't mix. They can mix to other kinds of pipes though like iron or gold. Useful if you need parallel lines of pipes. 

Void pipes delete anything that go into them, good for getting rid of excess or unwanted items.

Quartz pipes act like stone in that they don't connect with cobblestone or stone pipes but they do have the niche use in that items sped up by gold pipes maintain speed longer in quartz pipes than stone or cobblestone.

Clay pipes will insert into any connected inventory before moving on unlike cobblestone pipes which will split.

Sandstone pipes connect only to pipes.

Obsidian pipes suck up items that hit them like hoppers but imediate, they can have their range increased by using engines/dynamos on them.

Wooden Diamond pipes are an upgrade to wooden pipes by allowing filtering and some additonal options.

Apiarist pipes are used to filter based on different bee traits.

Lazuli and Dazuli pipes are used to paint items a color and only let through their color respectively. You set their color by right clicking on them with pipes. Don't worry about knowing how to use them as I've never seen anyone use them ever.
